name: Bus Simulator: MAX
description:
Be a bus driver in our newest bus driving game to feel like a knight of the road with Bus Simulator Max! Our bus game comes with a super realistic driving feeling, endless customization choices, huge open world and fun addictive gameplay for bus game enthusiasts.


Endless Selection of Buses and Customization Choices

Select a bus model from a wide range of different bus models and brands or design your own bus at our customization garage, modify it, paint and unleash your inner artist. You can create a masterpiece with the provided countless customization options of vinyls, rims, platings and paint to create your dream bus for the driving arena.

From classic to iconic concepts that were created by our talented designers, pick your favorite one to either drive around the city or freely to complete missions to level up and become the king of the road.

Multiplayer Mode

Bus Simulator Max offers multiplayer online mode for you to enjoy the bus driving experience by playing with your friends or family. Or if you feel like you want to challenge someone to spice things up a little bit you can always play with strangers in online multiplayer mode.

Advanced Features

Feel like a driver in Bus Simulator Max in which we aimed to combine the realism and satisfaction of driving a real coach to create the most sophisticated bus simulator and city bus on mobile with our most advanced physics engine to date.

With the help of our most advanced AI, for the first time ever on mobile, you'll get the experience live passenger feedback while driving

The vast open world created to test your ultimate drive skills while providing the real coach bus driving gameplay experience on mobile.

Experience the ultimate realism of driving thanks to our improved graphics, day/night cycle, real life sounds and our most refined pedestrian and traffic system to date.
